## MapViewUtils.calculateFovByFocalLength() function

Calculates the vertical field of view based on the focal length and the height.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function calculateFovByFocalLength(focalLength: number, height: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  focalLength | number | Focal length in pixels (see \[\[calculateFocalLengthByVerticalFov\]\]) |
|  height | number | Height of canvas in pixels. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
